item.title: @elonmusk: It's unbelievable. To be racist is a regrettable feature of the darkness of the human heart. But usu...
item.description: It's unbelievable. To be racist is a regrettable feature of the darkness of the human heart. But usually, the racism is targeting "the other." The West has decided that Noble Racism is when you target your racism inward. You are virtuous by exhibiting hatred toward your skin color.

item.title: @elonmusk: If Starmer is successful in banning@Xin Britain, I will move forward with legislation that is curren...
item.description: If Starmer is successful in banning@Xin Britain, I will move forward with legislation that is currently being drafted to sanction not only Starmer, but Britain as a whole. This would mirror actions previously taken by the United States in response to foreign governments restricting the platform, including the dispute with Brazil in 2024â€“2025, which resulted in tariffs, visa revocations, and sanctions and consequences tied to free speech concerns against Brazilian officials over concerns related to censorship and free-speech violations. Starmer should reconsider this course of action, or there will be consequences. There are always technical bugs during the early phases of new technology, especially AI, and those issues are typically addressed quickly. X treats these matters seriously and acts promptly. Letâ€™s be clear: this is not about technical compliance. This is a political war against@elonmuskand free speechâ€”nothing more.

item.title: @elonmusk: Did you know C.S. Lewis predicted the modern obsession with â€œbeing niceâ€ would destroy the soul? In ...
item.description: Did you know C.S. Lewis predicted the modern obsession with â€œbeing niceâ€ would destroy the soul? In The Abolition of Man, Lewis argues that when a society stops believing in objective virtue, it doesnâ€™t become tolerantâ€¦ it becomes manipulable. He calls the result â€œmen without chests.â€ People with appetites and intellects, but no courage, no honor, no trained moral instincts. They can calculate everything and defend nothing. Lewis saw that once we reject inherited moral law, we donâ€™t become free. We become raw materialâ€¦ easily shaped by propaganda, pleasure, and fear. Modern man prides himself on compassion while quietly surrendering every standard that once gave compassion meaning. Lewisâ€™s insight is brutal: a civilization that educates clever cowards will eventually be ruled by tyrants or technicians. Because when nothing is worth dying for, everything becomes negotiableâ€¦ including human dignity.

item.description: REVOLTING LIES! The two criminal illegal aliens who attacked Border Patrol in Portland are a gang member and his prostitute NOT an innocent â€œmarried couple.â€ The driver of the vehicle, Luis David Nico Moncada is a criminal illegal alien from Venezuela and suspected Tren de Aragua GANG MEMBER.
